body: <div class="p-4 mb-4 text-sm text-blue-800 rounded-lg bg-blue-50 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-blue-400" role="alert">
Info alert! Change a few things up and try submitting again.
<div class="p-4 mb-4 text-sm text-green-800 rounded-lg bg-green-50 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-green-400" role="alert">
Success alert! Change a few things up and try submitting again.
<div class="p-4 mb-4 text-sm text-yellow-700 rounded-lg bg-yellow-50 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-yellow-300" role="alert">
Warning alert! Change a few things up and try submitting again.
<div class="p-4 mb-4 text-sm text-red-800 rounded-lg bg-red-50 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-red-400" role="alert">
Danger alert! Change a few things up and try submitting again.
